job_title: Administrative Staff in Des Moines, IA
pros:
+ 100% retirement match up to 10% of your salary.
+ Facilities are excellent and the location is great (for now, moving in a few years)
+ Pay is above average
cons:
- Toxic culture: Senior administration (ELT) creates an environment where people gossip and departments don't work well together. They also often value the quantity of work over quality which makes work stressful and overbearing. People like to pass blame.
- Moving away from our beautiful, established facilities just west of downtown in a few years to go to West Des Moines

review_title: My position at DMU is quite challenging due to competition between the other CMAs.
